p: LP, JS, and PS contributed to the conception and design of the study. PA, AL, and JS designed and generated the benzodiazepine scaffold-containing compounds. LP and PS performed poxvirus experiments and wrote the first draft of the manuscript. AK and SS performed confocal imaging experiments. LP, PA, VO, JS, and PS edited the manuscript. All authors contributed to the manuscript revision and read and approved the submitted version.
